<!DOCTYPE html>
<html>
<head>
<meta data-lastmodified="2019-01-14T09:56:32" data-generated="2020-02-25T16:51:54">
	<style>

		body.empty table {
			visibility: hidden;
		}

		#empty-info {
			margin: 24px 0px;
			display: none;
		}

		body.empty #devicesSwitchContainer {
			flex: 0 0 auto;
			max-height: 17%;
			opacity: 0;
		}

		body.empty #empty-info {
			display: block;
		}

		body.empty .empty-div {
			display: block;
			position: absolute;
			top: 35%;
			margin-left: 54px;
		}

		/*.body-content {
			width: 100%;
			height: 100%;
			display: flex;
			justify-content: flex-start;
			flex-direction: column;
			padding-left: 300px;
			left: 0px !important;
		}*/

		body.empty .main-page {
			display: none;

		}

		.dev-table {
			width: 100%;
			max-width: 850px;
		}

		#lightTable > tr > td {
			vertical-align: middle;
		}

		/*muss noch in less-datei*/
		#mainDetailsLight .main-content > div a {
		    margin: 16px 0px;
		    text-decoration: underline;
		}

		/*muss noch in less-datei*/
		#mainDetailsLight .main-content > div .btn {
		    margin: 20px 0px;
		    -webkit-align-self: flex-start;
		    -ms-flex-item-align: start;
		    align-self: flex-start;
		}

		#devicesLightsContainer .dev-table th {
			padding-left: 1.5em !important;
		}

		#detail-img svg {
			max-width: 250px;
		}

		#detail-img svg{
			transform: scale(1.4);
			align-self: center;
			height: 100%;
		}

		#detail-img svg .li-state-line, #detail-img svg .li-line {
			stroke: #3e4e52;
		}

		#detail-img svg .li-line {
			stroke-width: 0.3px;
		}

		#detail-img svg .li-state-line, #detail-img svg .li-frame {
			stroke-width: 0.6px;
		}

		#detail-img svg .li-state {
			fill: none;
		}

		.main-content {
			margin-right: 0;
			padding-right: 0;
			flex-direction: column;
		}

		#devicesLightsContainer {
			overflow-y: auto;
			overflow-x: hidden;
			/*
			display: flex;
			flex-direction: column;
			margin-top: 8px;
			margin-bottom: 80px;
			*/
		}

		#lightTable tr.not-reachable > * {
		    opacity: 0.5;
		}


		.dev-table-hdr b:nth-child(3),
		td:nth-child(3),
		.dev-table-hdr b:nth-child(4),
		td:nth-child(4) {
				display: none;
		}


		/* product */
		@media (min-width: 600px) {
			.dev-table-hdr b:nth-child(4) { display: unset; }
			td:nth-child(4) {
				display: table-cell;
			}
		}

  		/* vendor */
	  	@media (min-width: 900px) {
			.dev-table-hdr b:nth-child(3) { display: unset; }
			td:nth-child(3) {
				display: table-cell;
			}
	  	}

		#progress {
			position: relative;
			flex: 1;
			background-color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.15);
			border-radius: 8px;
			height: 16px;
			overflow: hidden;
		}

		#progressBar {
			position: absolute;
			top: 0px;
			bottom: 0px;
			width: 0%;
			background-color: #55626b;
			box-sizing: border-box;
		}

		#time {
			margin-left: auto;
			padding-right: 41px;
			transition: opacity 500ms ease-out;
		}

		.bottom-bar {
			right: 0;
			position: fixed;
			bottom: 0px;
			left: 280px;
			background-color: #fafafa;
			padding: 32px 32px;
			opacity: 1;
			transition: transform 140ms ease-out 100ms,
			            opacity 120ms ease-out;
		}

		body.empty .bottom-bar,
		body.details .bottom-bar,
		.search-active .bottom-bar {
			opacity: 0;
			transform: translateY(200px);
		}

		#lights-cont {
			transition: transform 100ms ease-out 300ms;
			display: flex;
			flex-direction: column;
			justify-content: space-between;
			flex: 1;
			background-color: #fafafa;
			padding: 24px 32px;
			position: absolute;
			bottom: 0;
			left: 280px;
			right: 0;
		}

		.empty #lights-cont {
			margin-bottom: 40px;
		}

		#searchDiv {
			width: 100%;
			height: 60px;
			display: flex;
			justify-content: space-around;
			flex-direction: column;
			opacity: 0;
			transition: opacity 100ms ease-out;
		}

		.search-active #searchDiv, .search-active #lights-cont{
			opacity: 1;
			transition: all 100ms ease-out 100ms;
		}

		.empty-div.search {
			opacity: 0;
			transition: opacity 100ms ease-out 100ms;
		}

	    .main-content {
	    	max-height: 87%;
	    }

	    .empty #notEmptyBtn {
	    	opacity: 0;
	    	transition: opacity 100ms ease-out 100ms;
	    }

	    #notEmptyBtn {
	    	opacity: 1;
	    	transition: opacity 100ms ease-out 100ms;
	    }

	    .empty .empty-div {
	    	display: block;
	    	opacity: 1;
	    	transition: opacity 100ms ease-out 100ms;
	    }

	    .empty-div {
	    	opacity: 0;
	    	transition: opacity 100ms ease-out 100ms;
	    }

	    #notEmptyBtn {
	    	width: fit-content;
	    	margin-bottom: 6px;
	    	margin-left: 2px;
	    }
	</style>

<script>
	function openNav() {
		app.sidenav.classList.add('open');
		app.sidenav.focus();

		const runmode = app.config.get('runmode') || '';
		const docker = runmode.indexOf('docker') !== -1;

		if (gatewayVersion() > 20554 && !docker) { // added in 2.05.19/2.05.20, 2.05.55
			if (app.config.has('wifi') && app.config.get('wifi') !== "not-available") {
				$('#sidenav_link_network').removeClass('hidden');
			}
		}
	}

	function closeNav() {
		var path = sessionStorage.getItem('app.back.path') || "index.html";
		var param = sessionStorage.getItem('app.back.hash') || "";
		if ($('body').hasClass('static-nav')) {
			location.assign(path + param);
		} else {
			app.sidenav.classList.remove('open');
		}
	}

	(function() {
		const _SCREEN_MAX_WIDTH_PHONE_PORTRAIT = 416;

		if (window.innerWidth <= _SCREEN_MAX_WIDTH_PHONE_PORTRAIT) {
			document.body.classList.remove('static-nav');
		}

		// mark current item
		let pn = location.pathname;
		let idx = pn.lastIndexOf('/');
		if (idx === -1) idx = 0;
		else idx++;
		let file = pn.slice(idx);
		let navItem = document.querySelector('a[href$="' + file + '"]');

		if (navItem) {
			navItem.parentElement.classList.add('active');
		}

	})();

	window.addEventListener("load", function load(event){
		window.removeEventListener("load", load, false); //remove listener, no longer needed

		$('.sidenav').on('blur', function(e) {
			if (e.relatedTarget && $.contains(this, e.relatedTarget)) {
				return; // normal link
			}

			if (!$('body').hasClass('static-nav')) {
				closeNav();
			}
		});

		$('.sidenav a').on('click', function(e) {

			if (app.router && document.location.href.indexOf(e.target.href) === 0) {
				app.router.navigate(document.location.pathname, {trigger: true});
				e.preventDefault();
			}
		});

		$('#sidenavDiffuser').on('click', function(e) {
			closeNav();
		});
	}, false);
</script>

    <div class="body-content content-fade content-fade-0">

		<div id="main-table-light" class="main page" style="display: flex;">
			<div class="main-head">
				<h1 data-translateid="lights_devices">Lights list</h1>
			</div>

			<div class="main-content">
				<div class="dev-table-hdr">
					<b data-translateid="th_identify"></b>
					<b data-translateid="th_name">Name</b>
					<b data-translateid="th_vendor">Vendor</b>
					<b data-translateid="th_product">Product</b>
				</div>

				<div id="devicesLightsContainer" class="dev-scroll-cont">
					<!-- template for rending one row -->
					<script type="text/us-templ" id="light-item-template">
						<td class="light-icon"><svg class="item-icon" width="48" height="48"><use class="lightUseSvg" xlink:href="#bulb-icon" /> </svg></td>
						<td class="openDetail"><%- name %></td>
						<td class="openDetail"><%- manufacturer %></td>
						<td class="openDetail"><%- product %></td>
					</script>

					<table class="table table-hover dev-table">
						<!--<thead>
							<tr>
								<th data-translateid="th_identify"></th>

								<th data-translateid="th_product">Product</th>
							</tr>
						</thead>-->

						<tbody id="lightTable"></tbody>
					</table>
				</div>
			</div>
		</div>

					<div><span id="c_newLi_la">No new lights found</span></div>

				</div>

					  <div id="progressBar"></div>

					<svg width="24px" height="24px" style="margin-left: 16px; cursor: pointer;" onclick="startScan(0)"><use xlink:href="#delete-icon-sm"/></svg>
				</div>
			</div>
		</div>

		<div class="bottom-bar">
			<button id="notEmptyBtn" class="btn btn-default" data-translateid="btn_newLight" onclick="startScan()">Connect new light</button>

				<h1>

					<div class="item-edit pencil"><svg width="24" height="24" class="item-edit"><use transform="scale(0.48)" xlink:href="#rename-icon" /></svg></div>
				</h1>
				<a id="deleteLights_btn" type="button" class="hdr-delete-btn" data-toggle="modal" data-target="#deleteLightModal">
					<svg width="18" height="18"><use transform="scale(0.7)" xlink:href="#delete-icon-sm" /></svg>

					<span data-translateid="deleteLight">Lichter löschen</span>
				</a>
				<!--<button class="btn btn-default del-light">DEL</button>-->
			</div>
			<div class="main-content">

			<div id="detail-img">
				<svg with="196" height="196" viewBox="0 0 48 48" preserveAspectRatio="xMidYMid meet" style="margin-top:32px;">{icon_b}</svg>
			</div>

				<div style=" overflow-y: auto;">
					<div class="vendor"><span data-translateid="th_vendor">Vendor</span><span><%- manufacturer %></span></div>
					<div class="product"><span data-translateid="th_model">Model</span><span><%- product %></span></div>

					<div class="version"><span data-translateid="th_version">Version</span> <span><%- swversion %></span></div>
					<div class="version-ok" data-translateid="text_versionOk">Die Version ist auf dem neuesten Stand</div>

					<div style="display: flex; flex-direction: column;">

							<select id="groupSelect" style="position: absolute; opacity: 0; width: 250px; padding: 8px 16px;" onchange="addLightToGroup(this);"></select>
							<div id="listGroupsFromLight" style="position: absolute; opacity: 0;"></div>
						</div>
					</div>
				</div>
			</div>
		</script>

	<!-- Delete Light Modal -->
	<div class="modal fade" id="deleteLightModal" tabindex="-1" role="dialog" aria-labelledby="myModalLabel">

					<button type="button" class="btn btn-secondary pull-right" data-dismiss="modal"><span data-translateid="btn_cancel">Cancel</span></button>
				</div>
			</div>
		</div>
	</div>

	}
</style>

<div class="modal fade" id="renameLightModal" tabindex="-1" role="dialog">
	 <div class="modal-dialog" role="document">
		<div class="modal-content">
		  <div class="modal-header">
			<button type="button" class="close" data-dismiss="modal">×</button>
			<h2 class="modal-title" data-translateid="text_identifyLight">Identify light</h2>
		  </div>
		  <div class="modal-body">
				<div class="form-group has-feedback">
					<label class="control-label" for="inputRenameLight">Name</label>
					<input id="inputRenameLight" type="text" required class="form-control" data-validator-cb="verifyLightRename" aria-describedby="helpBlock" placeholder="" maxlength="32">
					<div class="glyphicon glyphicon-remove form-control-feedback"></div>
					<span class="text-danger"></span>
					<span id="helpBlock" class="help-block">
					</span>
				</div>
		  </div>
		  <div class="modal-footer">
				<button type="button" class="btn btn-primary pull-right" data-dismiss="modal" id="btnOk">Ok</button>
				<button type="submit" class="btn btn-primary pull-right hidden disabled" id="btnRenamLight" onclick="renameLight()"><span data-translateid="btn_rename">Rename</span></button>
				<button type="button" class="btn btn-secondary pull-right hidden" data-dismiss="modal" id="btnCancel"><span data-translateid="btn_cancel">Cancel</span></button>
		  </div>
		</div>
	 </div>
</div>

<script>

	window.addEventListener("load", function load(event){
		window.removeEventListener("load", load, false); //remove listener, no longer needed

		app.$renameLightModal = $('#renameLightModal');
		app.$renameLightInput = app.$renameLightModal.find('input');

		app.$renameLightModal.on('show.bs.modal', function() {
			var $fg = $('.form-group', $(this));

			$fg.removeClass('has-error');
			updateFeedbackIcon($fg);

			// enable rename button,
			// if input is valid and no error is shown
			var $btnOk = $("#btnOk");
			var $btnRename = $("#btnRenamLight");
			var $btnCancel = $("#btnCancel");

			$btnOk.removeClass('hidden');
			$btnRename.addClass('hidden disabled');
			$btnCancel.addClass('hidden');

			var l = app.lights.get(app.session.lid);
			if (l) {
				app.$renameLightInput.val(l.get('name'));

				restUpdateResource(l, {state:{alert: 'lselect'}})
				.then(x => {
					app.blinker = l;
					app.blinkInterval = setInterval(() => {
						if (app.blinker)
							restUpdateResource(app.blinker, {state:{alert: 'lselect'}});
					}, 30000);
				})
				.catch(e => {
					console.log(e);
				});
			}
		});

		app.$renameLightModal.on("shown.bs.modal", function () {

			if (!navigator.userAgent.match(/iPhone|iPad/))
				app.$renameLightInput.focus();
		});

		app.$renameLightInput.on('keyup', function(e) {

			if (e.keyCode == 13) { // enter

				var $btn = $('[type=submit]', app.$renameLightModal);

				if ($btn.hasClass('hidden')) { // nothing renamed: Ok
					this.blur(); // hide virtual keyboard
					app.$renameLightModal.modal('hide');
					return;
				}

				if ($btn.hasClass('disabled'))
					return;

				this.blur(); // hide virtual keyboard
				$btn.click();
			}
		});

		app.$renameLightModal.on('hidden.bs.modal', function () {

			if (app.blinkInterval) {
				clearInterval(app.blinkInterval);
				app.blinkInterval = null;
			}

			if (app.blinker) {
				restUpdateResource(app.blinker, {state:{alert: 'none'}})
				.then(x => {app.blinker = null; });
			}
		});
	}, false);

	/**
	 *  rename a light
	 *
	 * @memberOf module:lights/functions
	 *
	 * @returns {void}
	 */
	function renameLight(){

		var $btn = $("#btnRenamLight");
		var l = app.lights.get(app.session.lid);

		if (!l || $btn.hasClass('disabled')) {
			return;
		}

		var name = app.$renameLightInput.val().trim();
		if (l.get('name') !== name) {
			l.save({name: name}, {patch: true});
		}
		app.$renameLightInput.blur();
		app.$renameLightModal.modal('hide');
	}

	function verifyLightRename() {
		// common
		console.log("verify rename");
		var $parent = $(this).parent();
		var $errLine = $(".text-danger", $parent); //error-Text
		var $helpLine = $(".help-block", $parent);
		var val = $(this).val().trim();
		var errorText = '';

		var l = app.lights.get(app.session.lid);
		var oldName = l.get('name');

		// error test (1)
		// already exists?
		var dup = app.lights.find(function(light) {
			if (val === light.get('name') && val !== oldName)
				return true;
			return false;
		});

		if (dup) {
			$parent.addClass("has-error");
			errorText += '<span data-translateid="error_sorryLight">A light with the name </span> ';
			errorText += val;
			errorText += ' <span data-translateid="error_alreadyExists"> already exists.</span>';
			$errLine.html(errorText);
			loadErrorsLanguage();
		} else {
			$parent.removeClass("has-error");
		}

		// error test (2)
		// ...

		// common update feedback icon
		updateFeedbackIcon($parent);

		// enable rename button,
		// if input is valid and no error is shown
		var $btnOk = $("#btnOk");
		var $btnRename = $("#btnRenamLight");
		var $btnCancel = $("#btnCancel");

		if (val === oldName) {
			$btnOk.removeClass('hidden');
			$btnRename.addClass('hidden');
			$btnCancel.addClass('hidden');
		} else {
			$btnOk.addClass('hidden');
			$btnRename.removeClass('hidden');
			$btnCancel.removeClass('hidden');

			if (val.length > 0 && !$parent.hasClass("has-error")) {
				$btnRename.removeClass('disabled');
			} else {
				$btnRename.addClass('disabled');
			}
		}
	}

</script>
</body>
</html>
